# QLPreviewPanel

**Class**

A class that implements the Quick Look preview panel to display a preview of a list of items.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class QLPreviewPanel
```

## Overview

Every application has a single shared instance of [doc://com.apple.quicklookui/documentation/QuickLookUI/QLPreviewPanel] accessible through [doc://com.apple.quicklookui/documentation/QuickLookUI/QLPreviewPanel/shared()]. The preview panel follows the responder chain and adapts to the first responder willing to control it. A preview panel controller provides the content through methods defined in the [doc://com.apple.quicklookui/documentation/QuickLookUI/QLPreviewPanelDataSource] protocol.

You can’t subclass [doc://com.apple.quicklookui/documentation/QuickLookUI/QLPreviewPanel]; you can, however, customize its behavior using a [doc://com.apple.quicklookui/documentation/QuickLookUI/QLPreviewPanel/delegate]. See the [doc://com.apple.quicklookui/documentation/QuickLookUI/QLPreviewPanelDelegate] protocol for the methods to customize a preview panel’s behavior.

## Accessing the Shared Panel

- **shared()**: Returns the shared Quick Look preview panel instance.
- **sharedPreviewPanelExists()**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the system has created a shared Quick Look preview panel.

## Accessing the Preview Panel Controller

- **currentController**: The current first responder accepting to control the preview panel.
- **updateController()**: Asks the preview panel to update its current controller.

## Managing the Preview Items

- **dataSource**: The preview panel data source.
- **reloadData()**: Asks the preview panel to reload its data from its data source.
- **refreshCurrentPreviewItem()**: Asks the preview panel to recompute the preview of the current preview item.
- **currentPreviewItemIndex**: The index of the current preview item.
- **currentPreviewItem**: The currently previewed item.
- **displayState**: The preview panel’s display state.

## The Panel’s Delegate

- **delegate**: The delegate object that controls the preview panel’s behavior.

## Managing Full Screen Mode

- **enterFullScreenMode(_:withOptions:)**: Instructs the panel to enter full screen mode.
- **exitFullScreenMode(options:)**: Instructs the panel to exit full screen mode.
- **isInFullScreenMode**: The property that indicates whether the panel is in full screen mode.

## Previews

- **QLPreviewView**: A Quick Look preview of an item that you can embed into your view hierarchy.
- **QLPreviewItem**: A protocol that defines a set of properties you implement to make a preview of your application’s content.
- **QLPreviewPanelDataSource**: A protocol that the Quick Look preview panel uses to access the contents of its data source object.
- **QLPreviewPanelDelegate**: A protocol for the delegate of the Quick Look preview panel.
- **QLPreviewItemLoadingBlock**: A type that defines a block used to load a Quick Look preview item.
